description:
What do ogres, orcs and elves all have in common? They hate each other. Peter has absolutely no idea what he’s gotten himself into.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Peter Grill and the Battle of the Fates
Peter Grill e a Batalha dos Destinos
Peter Grill et le combat face au destin
Peter Grill to Innen no Tatakai
Peter Grill und der Kampf des Schicksals
ピーター・グリルと因縁の戦い
